channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 13th August
item.description:
28 day with 2 way traffic lights please renew x1 broken 700x700x lose drain cover stats required causing extreme noise nuisance to residents (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame) (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blockage, 13th August
item.description:
The drains outside number 16 and 18 Cleeve road are blocked. Note: during heavy rain the runoff water from the lawns has resulted in number 16 and 18 being flooded if this drain is blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Across road pothole, 13th August
item.description:
Entering Campion Park, off Jasmin Way. It’s been there several years and getting worse
